dcterms:description: The CSIQ database is used for full-reference image quality assessment, providing a set of distorted images along with their corresponding quality ratings.
dcterms:title: CSIQ

dcterms:description: The LIVE database is utilized for evaluating full-reference image quality assessment algorithms, containing a variety of distorted images with associated quality scores.

dcterms:description: The TID2013 database is employed for image quality assessment, featuring a diverse set of distorted images and their quality ratings, allowing for comprehensive evaluation of quality models.
dcterms:title: TID2013
